titles.title: Take Me In to the Holy

properties.copyright: 1987 Dayspring Music, LLC, Administered by Word Music Group, Inc.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Cm
Take me in to the Holy of Holies
Take me in by the blood of the Lamb
So take me in to the Holy of Holies
Take the coal cleanse my lips
Here I am

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Take me past the outer courts
And thru the holy place
Past the brazen altar
Lord I want to see Your face

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Pass me by the crowds of people
And the priests who sing their praise
I hunger and thirst for Your righteousness
And it's only found one place
